dict.acceptation: 女儿；产物，后代；（某地的）妇女；[生]子代；
女儿般的；[生]第一代的；子代的；

sent.orig: Second Daughter-in-law and Third Daughter-in-law exchanged secret looks of disdain.
sent.trans: 二奶奶和三奶奶偷偷做个鄙薄的眼色。

sent.orig: Her daughter Mary was rather quiet, but her other daughter Blanche was very different.
sent.trans: 她的女儿玛丽非常文静，但另一个千金布朗蒂就完全不一样了。

sent.orig: After the daughter awakens revolts, Li ignores totally, has seduced own one's own daughter forcefully.
sent.trans: 女儿惊醒后反抗，李某全然不顾，强行奸污了自己的亲生女儿。

sent.orig: Lu Lu is the daughter of my dead friend, I treat her as my own daughter.
sent.trans: 露露是我亡友的女儿，我一直把当成亲生女儿看待。

sent.orig: The daughter is he most precious treasure, after having the daughter the disposition also changed many.
sent.trans: 女儿是他最珍贵的宝贝，有了女儿之后，性格也改变了不少。
